maqras.text: Nguulumbila awu musi (wa Maaka)
Soni mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) tinchiŵa ŵakundisyidwa (kuputa ngondo) mu wele musiwu
Ni ngullumbila soni nangolo ni uŵelesi wajuŵeleche
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu m’matabu
Ana juganichisya yanti pangali ŵampaka ankombole (kumpa ilagasyo)
Jukuŵecheta (mwakutwanga kuti): “Njonasile yipanje yejinji (kuti Usilamu usilale).”
Ana juganichisya kuti pangali ŵaakun'bona
Ana nganitun'gumbila meso gaŵili (gajukulolela)
Ni lulimi kwisa soni ngomo siŵili (syajukuŵechetela)
Ni tun’jongolele matala gaŵili (lyambone ni lyakusakala, kuti jusagule lyajukusaka)
Ana pakwete pajujesile litala lyamwitumbi (lyalikam’bikasye ku Mbepo)
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya litala lyamwitumbi
(Litala lyamwitumbi nimasengo gambone nambo gakunonopa, mpela): gopola kapolo
Kapena kupeleka yakulya palisiku lyasala
(Kumpa) jwawina jwapaulongo
Kapena masikini jwaluwunduwundupe (ligongo lyakulaga nnope)
Soni nikuŵa (nkutola yakulyajo) jumpepe mwa aŵala ŵaakulupilile, ni kulimbikasyanaga ya kupilila soni ni kulimbikasyanaga ya kutendelana chanasa
Ŵanganyao niŵandu ŵakun'dyo (ŵali ŵambone)
Nambo ŵandu ŵaagakaaniile ma Ȃya Getu ŵanganyao niŵandu ŵakunchiji (ŵali ŵakusakala)
Kwaŵanganyao kuchiŵa kwana Moto Wakuunichila ni kutika (wangali pakopochela)
Ngulilumbila lyuŵa ni lilanguka lyakwe
Ni mwesi ndema jaukulikuya (lyuŵalyo)
Ni muusi ndema jaukulilosya palangulangu
Ni chilo ndema jachikuliunichila (kuti likaoneka)
Kwisa soni liwunde ni Juŵalitaŵile (mwakulitalichisya)
Ni litaka ni Juŵalitandiche (mwakulijaasasya)
Kwisa soni ntima ni Juŵaukolosisye
Basi ni jwaumanyisye yakusakala yakwe ni yambone yakwe
Pamasile paapundile jwauswejesye (ntima wakwe)
Soni pamasile papelelwe jwautwinyichisye (ntima wakwe mu sambi)
Ŵaakaaniile ŵanya Asamudu ligongo lyakusumba mpika kwao
Ndema jajwalipeleche jwakusakalilwa jwao (kuulaga ngamiya)
Basi Ntenga jwa Allah (Swaleh) ŵasalile kuti: “(Aji ni) ngamiya ja Allah, sano ngasin'jikanyaga kumwa mesi (palisiku lyakwe)
Nambo ŵankaaniile nikujiulaga; basi Ambuje ŵao ŵajonasile ligongo lya chileŵi chao; niŵalandenye pachonasikocho
Soni jwangajogopa yakuichisya yakwe
Nguchilumbila chilo ndema jachikuunichila (chilichose ni chipi chakwe)
Ni muusi ndema jakukulanguka
Ni Ajula (Allah) Jwagumbile chachilume ni chachikongwe
Chisimu itendo yenu iŵele yakulekangana-lekangana
Sano mundu jwaakutola (petala lya Allah) ni kuŵa niwoga (wakun'jogopa Jwalakwe)
Ni kulupilila yambone nnope (yatakalipidwe ligongo lyakutola)
Basi chitun'jepepachisye litala lyakwalukangana (lyakutendela yambone)
Nambo mundu jwachatende ubayili ni kuliona kusichila
Ni kanila yambone nnope (yaakajiile kuipata akatole)
Basi chitun'jepepachisye litala lyausito (lyakutendela yakusakala)
Soni ngasichija kunkamuchisya chipanje chakwe ndema jagwila (ku Moto)
Chisimu Kukwetu nikwachili chongolo
Soni chisimu Uwwe ni twachinsyene Akhera ni Duniya
Basi nguntetela ya Moto waukolela (mwamachili)
Ngaaja kuwujinjila ikaŵeje jwakusakalilwa nnope
Ajula jwaakuŵa nkukanila ni kusyulula
Ni takaŵambasyidwe nao mundu jwawoga kusyene (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Ajula jwaakutola chipanje chakwe pakuliswejesya
Soni pangali kwa jwalakwe jwalijose jwaŵantendele yaukoto yaikuŵa ili nkuusyidwa
Ikaŵeje (jukutola) pakusachilila Ngope ja M’mbujeegwe (Allah) Jwapenani kusyene (kuti jukajione ku Akhera)
Ni juchija kusengwa
Nguulumbila nsana
Ni chilo ndema jachikutulala
Ngananneka Ambuje ŵenu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) soni nganam'benga
Soni chisimu umi wambesi uŵele wambone nnope kukwenu kupunda wandanda
Soni tachija kumpa Ambuje ŵenu (yambone) ni tinchisengwa
Ana nganansimana n'di ŵawina nikumpa liwuto lyambone
Soni ni ŵansimene n'di ŵangachimanya chongoko (jajili Qur'an ni malamusi ga Dini) nikun'jongola
Ni ŵansimene soni n'di ŵakulaga nikunsichilisya
Sano mwanache jwawina basi ngasimunchima
Nombe soni jwakuŵenda basi ngasimunkalipila
Soni chindimba cha Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) basi chisimbani (pakutogolela ni kutenda yambone)
